title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has incorrect Class.forName() usage
description: The current implementation of BidiUtil in the win32 environment is using Class.forName() in an incorrect way.
OB: The bug report does not provide details about the observed behavior.
EB: The bug report does not provide details about the expected behavior.
SR:
To fix this issue, change the following line: 

Class.forName("BidiUtil") 

to: 

new BidiUtil().getClass()
